data:
This tower is equipped with a precise archer who fires sharp arrows at the invading enemies.
Its shooting speed and accuracy are unmatched.
It doesn't have a long range, but it is effective against both ground and flying enemies.
The arrows create a shockwave upon impact, causing additional damage.
The arrows inflict  25% more damage and create a shockwave upon impact, causing additional damage.
The archer fires an additional arrow, causing more damage.
